longTitle: Grand View Motel, Raton, New Mexico, Steve Fitch, 1981

label.title: Grand View Motel, Raton, New Mexico
label.description: Colour photography only hit its stride in the 1970s. Photographers suddenly looked at the vernacular landscape through different – coloured – glasses. They saw facets that had not yet been noticed: the discordant colours of graffiti, or the pink and green glow of neon light. For his photographic series Diesels and Dinosaurs Fitch singled out these typically American expressions of advertising and light architecture. Later, as a sculptor, he began making his own neon installations.
